data: Collaborating within a team to develop scalable APIs with NestJS MongoDB for Jio TV content management service, serving a colossal user base of 452 million users.
Contributing to Node.js cron script development, enhancing content delivery efficiency in a team environment.

Worked as part-time SDE and contributed to front-end development of Seller Central web app, enabling streamlined order and logistics management, resulting in successful pre-seed funding of nearly $5 million.
Created Strategic Insights Tool web-app which achieved to increase 30% sales for Indian sellers, delivering brand performance and marketplace insights
Collaborated on developing a high-performance Excel sheet upload API for My Jio app, serving 13.2M daily users.
Conducted load testing and attained 224ms average response time for 1000 request/s, containerized with Docker and Kubernetes for scalable deployment.
Integrated Jinja templates for HTML rendering and utilized Azure Repos and pipelines leading to a 30% reduction in development time.
Developed comprehensive website with intuitive user experience, increasing traffic by 50% and improving conversion rates by 15%.
Made a weather app for client, with auto Geolocation detection feature and displaying weather in friendly UI design.
Worked as a team player for the making the Gymkhana website with admin portal where post, polls and notifications can be sent to students of ISM.
